intro: Meliosma boliviensis, commonly known as the Bolivian meliosma, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Theaceae. It is native to the Andean regions of South America, particularly Bolivia and Peru. The plant is characterized by its evergreen foliage and small, fragrant flowers that bloom in spring. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a smooth, waxy texture. Meliosma boliviensis is often found in moist, shaded forest environments, where it thrives in the understory.
